question: Can you tell us your height?
Can you tell us your current weight?
Are you currently taking any medication, or have you recently finished a course of medication?
What is the name of the medication? Why do you take it?
Are you taking an alpha-blocker to help reduce blood pressure, or to treat prostate symptoms (e.g. Alfuzosin, Prazosin, Doxazosin, Tamsulosin)?
Please provide more details: what drug are you taking, and what dose? And why are you taking it?
Do you have a GTN spray/tablets from your doctor in case of chest pain? Or do you take Isosorbide mononitrate, Isosorbide dinitrate or Nicorandil?
Please provide the details of any of these medications that you are taking, or that you have in case of chest pain.
Are you allergic to any medicines or other substances (e.g peanuts/soya)?
